title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up
descriptions:
Introducing the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game, a thrilling and engaging game designed for ages 8 and up! This family board game edition is themed around Kids vs. Parents, providing fun and excitement for everyone.

With a total of 260 cards, this game features two unique decks tailored for kids and adults. The kids' deck includes 130 cards with familiar guess words and two forbidden words per card. The adult deck also contains 130 cards, with varied guess words and a varying number of forbidden words, making the game more challenging for grown-ups.

In total, there are over 1,000 guess words to keep the gameplay fresh and entertaining. The fast-paced gameplay features timed rounds, with the objective being to get your teammates to guess the words without saying any of the forbidden words. The penalty for saying a forbidden word is a point for the opposing team.

The game includes two decks of cards, a one-minute timer, and a squeaker, adding to the excitement and urgency of the game. The winning condition is simple: the team with the most points wins!

This Hasbro Gaming product is perfect for family game nights, promising laughter, competition, and endless fun. So, gather your family and friends, and let the games begin!
